test.name: _CheckNoProductionMode
test.description: Production mode must be false when running our automated tests; many of them depend this to display dev-mode error pages and the like. This test ensures that.

test.name: AbstractController
test.description: Test to ensure that hitting a JSP associated with an abstract page flow controller class will not try to instantiate the class, and that hitting an abstract page flow directly will return a descriptive error.

test.name: Accesskey
test.description: Test of the accesskey attribute

test.name: AccesskeyGroup
test.description: Test of the accesskey attribute

test.name: ActionAttr
test.description: Test of forwarding to local actions, external actions, and shared flow actions through the 'action' attribute on @Jpf.SimpleAction, @Jpf.ConditionalForward, and @Jpf.Forward.

test.name: ActionChaining
test.description: Test of passing forms and pageflow-scoped forms with action chaining.

test.name: ActionInterceptorsChain
test.description: Test of action interceptor chains, including interrupting them in the middle.

test.name: ActionInterceptorsGlobal
test.description: Test of global action interceptors, which apply to all actions in all page flows. Also tests custom properties configured within the action-interceptor element.

test.name: ActionInterceptorsOverrideForwards
test.description: Test of various ways to override the original action's Forward in an action interceptor.

test.name: ActionInterceptorsSimple
test.description: Test of "simple" action interceptors, which are configured wholly in netui-config.xml (they don't require user ActionInterceptor classes).

test.name: ActionResponse
test.description: Write directly to the response in the an Action and then return null.

test.name: AddExpressionMessages
test.description: Test of using ExpressionMessage (or FlowController.addValidationErrorExpression) to add explicit strings or expressions as validation messages.

test.name: Anchor
test.description: Test of the anchor tag

test.name: AnchorActions
test.description: Verify that the expression binding of anchor.action works

test.name: AnchorError
test.description: Errors in the Anchor control

test.name: AnchorFormPosting
test.description: Using parameters on a anchor fill in an action form.

test.name: AnchorPosting
test.description: Using parameters on a anchor to databind to the page flow.

test.name: AnyBean
test.description: Test of the Any Bean Action Forms feature, including passing to/from actions and nested flows.

test.name: AnyBeanBinding
test.description: AnyBeanBinding

test.name: AnyBeanOverload
test.description: Test of overloading actions with the Any Bean Action Forms feature.

test.name: AnyBeanReturn
test.description: Tests returning a non-ActionForm-derived bean from a nested page flow to an overloaded action in a shared flow.

test.name: AppState
test.description: Binding to the global app state, both directly on a page and through the page flow.

test.name: AppStatePass
test.description: Binding to the global app state, sending state between page flows.

test.name: AttrBinding
test.description: Binding scalar and array values for Strings, ints, floats and booleans.

test.name: AttributeTag
test.description: Test of the attribute tag

test.name: AttributeTagErrors
test.description: Test the errors of the attribute tag

test.name: BackButtonToNested
test.description: Test of using the back button to go back from a nested page flow (B) to another nested page flow (A). Unless pageflow-renesting is enabled in netui-config.xml, the previous instance of A should be used; a new instance of A should not be created, and the page flow stack should not grow in size.

test.name: BackButtonToNonNested
test.description: Test of using the back button to go from a nested page flow to a non-nested page flow. The original non-nested page flow instance should be retrieved, not a new one.

test.name: BeginForm
test.description: Test passing a form to the begin node.

test.name: Binding
test.description: Test binding structures, arrays, and hashmaps in the page flow

test.name: BindingUpdateErrors
test.description: Test of the BindingUpdateErrors tag.

test.name: BlankCountryValue
test.description: Validation locale rule annotation with country value equal to blank space charactes should not create a formset with a country attribute of spaces.

test.name: BreakoutNesting
test.description: Test breaking out of nesting

test.name: IdMapTreeNoHtml2
test.description: Test of tagId inside of a tree without a ScriptContainer

test.name: ImageAnchorActions
test.description: Tests the bindability of the action attribute on an image anchor

test.name: InheritActions
test.description: Test to ensure that you can forward to an inherited action using the 'action' attribute on @Jpf.SimpleAction or @Jpf.Forward.

test.name: InheritControllerActionAttributes
test.description: Test inheritance and values for loginRequired, readOnly, and rolesAllowed attributes set on the Controllers and Actions.

test.name: InheritControllerSimpleActionAttributes
test.description: Test inheritance and values for loginRequired, readOnly, and rolesAllowed attributes set on the Controllers and Simple Actions.

test.name: InheritControls
test.description: Test of inheriting control member fields.

test.name: InheritFormBeanMessages
test.description: Test to ensure that a @Jpf.FormBean annotation is inherited from a superclass if none is provided on the derived class, and that it is overridden if the derived class has one.

test.name: InheritGlobalForwards
test.description: Test that inherited and overridden page flow controller Jpf.Forward annotations for global forwards work correctly.

test.name: InheritLocalPaths
test.description: Test to ensure that local paths can be inherited from a base class page flow, when inheritLocalPaths=true on @Jpf.Controller.

test.name: InheritOverloadedActions
test.description: Check that inherited overloaded actions are handled correctly in the runtime based on the disambiguated action paths in the Struts module config file.

test.name: InheritSharedFlowActions
test.description: Test the delegating action mappings for inherited actions and simple actions in shared flows.

test.name: InheritSharedFlowField
test.description: Test SharedFlow fields declared in a base page flow class and inherited in a derived class. (J1096)

test.name: InheritUseFormBean
test.description: Test inheritance of actions and simple actions with the useFormBean annotation attribute. (J1144)

test.name: InitFormBeanInterface
test.description: Test to ensure that we can initialize the form bean on a JSP even when the destination action accepts an interface as its form bean argument, and the previous action passes a concrete implementation of that interface on the Forward.

test.name: InitStrutsActionForm
test.description: Test to ensure that you can use the expected Struts request attribute to access a Struts ActionForm that has been passed to the page (and that the bean is not wrapped in an AnyBeanActionForm).

test.name: InitWithDerivedFormBean
test.description: Test to ensure that you can initialize a page with an instance of a form bean class that's derived from the one that's expected.

test.name: IteratorTest
test.description: Tests that warnings are returned for null object use by iterators

test.name: J159
test.description: Verification of tagId on Options.

test.name: J160
test.description: Verification that an Area can submit a form.

test.name: J161
test.description: Verify that setting tagId and formSubmit on an anchor coexist.

test.name: J162
test.description: Verify linkName and tagId on an anchor coexist

test.name: J163
test.description: Verify that Anchors with only TagId produce lookup code.

test.name: J166
test.description: Demo of how "sticky" tree creation works

test.name: J172
test.description: Verify that message resources can be used in shared flow exception handlers.

test.name: J176
test.description: Verify that a two forms going to the same action produce valid XHTML

test.name: J189
test.description: Verification of the lookupIdScope method without a sep being passed to it.

test.name: J249
test.description: Verify applying formatters to Label

test.name: J250
test.description: Verify the formatDefaultValue attribute

test.name: J297
test.description: Verify that Action on a treeElement only overrides that item

test.name: J324
test.description: Verification of TreePropertyOverride of expansion and selection actions

test.name: J326
test.description: Verification that mixed content will not produce a label

test.name: J359
test.description: Verification that the end DIV tag is not being created by the HTML tag

test.name: J410
test.description: ScriptBlock with a couple of invalid configurations resulting in JavaScript errors

test.name: J430
test.description: Prevent setting the ParameterMap map attribute with null

test.name: J461
test.description: Remove child on a treeElement.

test.name: J475
test.description: Verification that the lookup Javascript works inside of a table.

test.name: J478
test.description: Verification that root images appear in dynamic trees.

test.name: J480
test.description: Verification that a tagId inside a tag file works correctly with a SC outside the tag file.

test.name: J480b
test.description: Verification of jsp:include with ScriptContainers.

test.name: J502
test.description: Verify that the parameterMap tag can accept Maps containing String / String[] as key / value

test.name: J505
test.description: Multiple expandOnServer trees on a single page

test.name: J517
test.description: Report error when the dataOptionSource on a select can not be made into an iterator.

test.name: J519
test.description: ExpandOnServer bug that caused the node after the one being expanded to expand.

test.name: J522
test.description: Error in Area tag.

test.name: J533
test.description: Simple test of TreeHtmlAttributeInfo constructor.

test.name: J631
test.description: Test to ensure that form bean message resources (from @Jpf.FormBean) are used even when the current page flow has no default message resources.

test.name: J757
test.description: Test to ensure that if an exception is handled by forwarding to an error page, and the error page itself throws an exception, the second exception is thrown out to the container, to avoid an infinite loop of exception handling.

test.name: J785
test.description: Test to ensure that we don't blow up when using a button to override the form action, where the button adds a request parameter that looks like a deeply-nested property (e.g., "foo.bar").

test.name: J797
test.description: Test to ensure that when an ActionInterceptor is used to "inject" a nested page flow, the original query parameters are restored when the desired action is finally run.

test.name: J841
test.description: Test TextArea tag to make sure it does not remove a leading empty line.

test.name: J898
test.description: Test to ensure that exception handling does not blow up with a CNFE when an exception handler method returns null.

test.name: J909
test.description: Test behavior of PageFlowUtils.strutsLookup() when the response is already committed.

test.name: J962
test.description: Test to ensure that we don't get an assertion error if we create a page flow controller through FlowControllerFactory, even when its onCreate() throws an exception.

test.name: J971
test.description: Test calling TreeElement.clearChildren() on a node that has never had children added.

test.name: J976
test.description: Test to ensure that the netui:anchor and netui:button tags both render the correct URL for an action when 1) A base class action is hit through a derived page flow, and 2) The action forwards to a page that's local to the base page flow, and 3) The page has a link to another base class action, and 4) inheritLocalPaths=true on the @Jpf.Controller annotation.

test.name: J977
test.description: Test to ensure that if a base class action forwards to another action, it forwards to the action in the derived page flow, if there is an overriding one there.

test.name: J1009
test.description: Test to ensure that you can still successfully end a nested page flow in a popup window after running actions on the page flow in the original window.

test.name: J1024
test.description: Test to ensure that page flow nesting is friendly to the browser back button.

test.name: J1030
test.description: Test Class-level @Jpf.Forward annotations with inheritLocalPaths=true in the derived class.

test.name: J1054
test.description: Test that the desired form bean can be created correctly when inheriting or overriding a simple action with the useFormBean attribute.

test.name: J1059
test.description: Test the FlowController.addActionError() method, called from within an exception handler.

test.name: J1060
test.description: Test initialization and access to an inherited control declared with default (package) access via protected/public methods in the super class page flow.

test.name: J1091
test.description: Test to ensure that the checkBoxGroup, radioButtonGroup, and select work inside of repeating tags

test.name: J1097
test.description: Handling exceptions from end context on page flow ControlContainerContext.

test.description: Test the message / messageArg tags

test.name: MissingActionOutput
test.description: Test to ensure that the correct exceptions are thrown for missing action output (MissingActionOutputException) and null action output (NullActionOutputException).

test.name: MockPortal
test.description: Tests basic link navigation, form submittal, nesting, and scoping in our simulated portal.

test.name: MockPortalListenTo
test.description: Tests 'listenTo' and exception handling under our simulated portal.

test.name: MockPortalMultipart
test.description: Test ScopedServletUtils.getOuterRequest() to make sure it can handle a MultipartRequestWrapper (BEEHIVE-882)... for now this is a MANUAL test until testRecorder can handle multipart requests (BEEHIVE-483)

test.name: MockPortalPopupWindows
test.description: Test of popup window support (really, a test of generating the right javascript) in MockPortal.

test.name: MockPortalScopingTest
test.description: Tests 'jpfScopeID' parameter under our simulated portal. This parameter causes the targeted page flow to live in a given session 'scope', which is the same scope used by portlets.

test.name: MockPortalScopingTest2
test.description: Test of targeting a particular portlet scope from a popup window.

test.name: MockPortalTreeExpand
test.description: Dynamic Tree with runAtClient, expandOnServer and expansion in the onExpand method, within MockPortal

test.name: ModuleConfigLocator
test.description: Test DynamicSubappActionServlet.ModuleConfigLocators, which allow the user to specify alternate locations for auto-registered Struts config files.

test.name: MultiForms
test.description: Posting a form to different action which take differnt forms.

test.name: MultiForms2
test.description: Test to make sure multiple forms in a JSP don't cause conflicts.

test.name: MultipleActionsSameBean
test.description: Test to ensure that two forms on the same page can submit to two actions that accept the same form bean type, and that form-bean-specific messages from the bean (defined in @Jpf.FormBean) are applied in each case.

test.name: MultipleDatasource
test.description: Test of Compound expressions used as data source

test.name: MultipleForms
test.description: Multiple forms on a single page

test.description: Test that multiple nested page flows can return the same action differentiated by the return form.

test.description: Test to ensure that the right lifecycle methods are called when nesting/returning within a single request.

test.description: A simple test of validation in a Form.

test.description: Test a form bean that extends the Struts ActionForm and overrides validate().

test.description: Test of the @Jpf.ValidateCustom annotation, for user custom validation rules.

test.description: Test of declarative validation on external form beans, using messages defined in the page flow.

test.description: Test of declarative validation on external form beans, using messages defined in the form bean (@Jpf.FormBean annotation).

test.name: ValidateField
test.description: Ensure that a specific locale rule on a field (Jpf.ValidationLocaleRules annotation) fires even if there are no default rules defined for the field.

test.name: ValidateStrutsActionForm
test.description: Test to ensure that declarative validation annotations (including form-bean-specific message resources) works correctly on beans that extend the raw Struts ActionForm.

test.name: ValidateThroughAction
test.description: Test of declarative validation through annotations on action methods.

test.name: ValidateThroughClass
test.description: Test of declarative validation through the @Jpf.Controller annotation.

test.name: ValidateThroughForm
test.description: Test of declarative validation through form field annotations.

test.name: ValidateURL
test.description: Test to ensure that the @Jpf.ValidateURL annotation works correctly.

test.name: ValidateUseFormBean
test.description: Test form bean validation when Action annotations set the useFormBean attribute.

test.name: Validation2
test.description: Tests of basic validation and validation using the Struts ValidatorPlugIn (as well as netui:error, netui:errors).

test.name: ValidationArgExpressions
test.description: Test of using databinding expressions in validation message arguments.

test.name: ValidationDefaultMessages
test.description: Test of default (built-in) validation messages, which are accessible even when the user has not specified a default message bundle in the page flow.

test.name: ValidatorMerge
test.description: Test the validatorMerge attribute for the Controller annotation.

test.name: ValidatorMerge11
test.description: Test the validatorMerge attribute for the Controller annotation with version 1.1 of the validator.

test.name: ValidatorMsgArgs
test.description: Test the support for rule messages and args in the declarative validation annotations.

test.name: ValidatorMsgArgs11
test.description: Test the support for rule messages and args in the declarative validation annotations with version 1.1 of the validator.

test.name: ValidatorMsgBundles
test.description: Test the support for alternative message bundles for messages and args in the declarative validation annotations (version 1.1 of the validator).

test.name: VariantValidation
test.description: Test support of locale variant in the validation locale rules and creation of the validation rules XML file.

test.description: Test of using the Visible tag in a template

test.name: VisibleError
test.description: Error databinding the Visible tag
